thread.title: Could have stayed longer-will next time
thread.title_full: Could have stayed longer-will next time - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: larry87120
title: Could have stayed longer-will next time
text: I chose this hotel because I was looking for a nice place close to Paddington Station as I had a morning flight out and wanted to be close to the Heathrow Express train. The Royal Park was a very pleasant surprise as it a wonderful small hotel with impeccable service. The room was very nice and the location was perfect. I will definitely stay at the Royal on my next stay and will stay longer too.
